body.name: Portable Fan, Large Capacity 2000 mAh, Type-C Rechargeable Portable Fan, Adjustable Air Flow Level Mini Fan, Waist Belt Fan
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 33 mins
features: 1: Adjustable Air Flow From The Top: The aLLreLi portable fan is a new product for 2021. The air outlet is located on the top of the fan so you can blow it directly on your face to feel cool. The neck fan comes with a strap that can be hung on your neck to completely free your hands. Also, by pressing the button you can switch between weak wind and natural wind and strong winds

2: Innovative 4-in-1 portable fan: Can be used in a wide range of ways, such as hanging it on your waist or neck, holding it in your hand, or placing it on a table for the strongest compact feel. Comes with a neck strap that can be adjusted and detached, allowing air to flow from your neck to your face to make you feel cool while walking on the train or on the walk. It also comes with a clip, so it can be used as a waist belt fan

3: 2,000 mAh High Capacity & Type-C Power Fan: Uses a built-in battery with a large capacity of 2,000 mAh that can be used continuously for up to 10 hours. Comes with a Type-C cable, so you can easily use it when you go out. You can use it while charging your computer or mobile battery, so you can rest assured that it is not possible to charge it when you go out or in places where it cannot be charged

4: Lightweight & Easy to Carry: Size: 3.4 x 3.4 x 2.2 inches (8.6 x 8.6 x 5.7 cm); Weight: 4.9 oz (142 g); This neck fan is large enough to fit in your palm of your hand, and can be easily stored in your bag or clothes pocket. In extreme heat, cooling your neck area for a cooler feel and cooler. In particular, when you walk outside, it greatly reduces the feeling of stuffiness and prevents heatstroke. This is a must-have item for summer outings, and can be used comfortably next year and again

5: ALLreLi Fan, Safe Support: Great for a variety of occasions throughout the day, such as indoor, car, school, yoga, fireworks festivals, sports, watching, traveling, going out, driving, shopping, commuting, office, exercise, excursions, festivals, walking, mountain climbing, etc. We offer a 1 year manufacturer's warranty from the date of purchase, and we can exchange the product for free if it is damaged in transit, initial defects or other defects occurring during shipping
